metadata.title: CVE-2021-29971 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: If a user had granted a permission to a webpage and saved that grant, anywebpage running on the same host - irrespective of scheme or port - wouldbe granted that permission. *This bug only affects Firefox for Android.Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 90.

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
